story.storykicker: The Broadcast Engineering Consultants India Limited (BECIL) is hiring for various posts on contract basis.
story.storybody:
The Broadcast Engineering Consultants India Limited (BECIL) has issued an advertisement inviting applications from interested, eligible candidates for recruitment to various posts, on contract basis.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 19

Name of the posts:

Content Auditor- 01
Senior Monitor- 03
Monitor- 15

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualification:

Content Auditor- The candidates interested in applying for the post should have done PG Diploma in Journalism/Mass Communication and have three years of experience in visual media or news agencies like ANI, PTI, UNI etc.

OR

They should have retired as News Editor / Dy. Director (News) from DD/ AIR in the pre-revised pay scale of Rs. 10,000-15200.

Senior Monitor- The candidate applying for the position should have done PG Diploma in Journalism and have minimum two-year experience in Media or News agencies.

OR

They should have retired from DD/ AIR as News Editor/ Assistant Director (News) in pre-revised scale of Rs. 8,000-13,500.

Monitor- The candidate should be a graduate and have proficiency in Computer with knowledge (proficiency) of Language concerned and minimum one-year experience in the field of Media/News.

Selection procedure:

The candidates will be selected on the basis of their performance in the interview/exam conducted by the organisation.

Pay scale:

Content Auditor- The selected candidates will draw a consolidated salary of Rs 40,000 per month.

Senior Monitor- The selected candidates will draw a consolidated salary of Rs 30,000 per month.

Monitor- The selected candidates will draw a consolidated salary of Rs 23,000 per month.

How to apply:

The candidates have to send their application form in the prescribed format by speed post/in person to 'Broadcast Engineering Consultants India Ltd, C 56/A 17, Sector 62, NOIDA-201307.

Application fees:

The candidates have to pay a sum of Rs 300 towards an application fee, in the form of a demand draft drawn in favour of 'Broadcast Engineering Consultants India Limited' payable at New Delhi.

Candidates belonging to the SC/ST/PC categories are exempted from application fees.

Important date:

Last date for the submission of an application June 21, 2016.
